title: Corporate Food Services
paragraph: We understand that the impact of employees’ health on your business can be huge. A healthy and happy workforce will be more positive, engaged, & productive and can bring wider benefits to your business.

title: NHS & Hospital Catering
paragraph: Sodexo has become the long-term strategic partner of many healthcare organisations by designing, managing and delivering a range of food services which allow our clients to focus on delivering excellent patient care.

title: Our Food Services & Catering for Schools
paragraph: School meals have come a long way in recent years. Parents want to know their children are being offered healthy, nutritious and responsibly-sourced meals that will fuel their school day. Young people want variety and to try foods from different countries and cultures.

title: Food services to feed the needs of every student
paragraph: Catering and food services in higher education are key to academic performance.This generation of students has a real love of food. They want variety in their meals and to try foods from different cultures and countries. They want choices that suit their vegetarian, vegan, pescatarian and flexitarian diets. They want to know that the food they are eating is sourced responsibly from sustainable sources. And, of course, they want affordable dining options at times that fit around their academic and social schedules.

title: Corporate Food Services
paragraph: We understand that the impact of employees’ health on your business can be huge. A healthy and happy workforce will be more positive, engaged, & productive and can bring wider benefits to your business.

title: Corporate Food Services
paragraph: Food services play an important role in creating workplaces which inspire, engage and ultimately improve the productivity of the workforce; optimising employees’ health and wellbeing, improving productivity and creating vibrant areas for employees to not only eat, but socialise and collaborate with colleagues.
